original_title: Dous anos, catro meses, un día
overview: With no choice, César faced leaving his family behind, quitting his job and joining the Army. In an unprecedented chain of events he became the first conscientious objector in Galicia (Spain) to be put in prison. Now, nearly thirty years later, Two Years, Four Months, A Day takes a look at what made him do it.
tagline: From the sea to a cell
title: Two Years, Four Months, A Day
